comments.body:
I noticed that the previous test code fails because it's not cause the expected exception.
`my_dir` is resolved as a local file system.
```
Warehouse path is 'file:/Users/dongjoon/APACHE/spark-merge/sql/core/my_dir'.
```

```scala
  def qualifyWarehousePath(hadoopConf: Configuration, warehousePath: String): String = {
    val tempPath = new Path(warehousePath)
    val qualified = tempPath.getFileSystem(hadoopConf).makeQualified(tempPath).toString
    logInfo(s"Warehouse path is '$qualified'.")
    qualified
  }
```

With the updated test case, I confirmed that the following exception occurs if we don't have @cloud-fan 's previous patch.
```
[info] - SPARK-34558: Create a working SparkSession with a broken FileSystem *** FAILED *** (52 milliseconds)
[info]   org.apache.hadoop.fs.UnsupportedFileSystemException: No FileSystem for scheme "unknown"
```
Sorry for missing this. Let me make a quick follow-up.
